articles.title: Historic statue of Clark unveiled at SCG
articles.description: Former Australia captain Belinda Clark becomes the first female cricketer to have a statue cast of her, with a bronze sculpture unveiled at the Sydney Cricket Ground.
articles.content:
Belinda Clark was inducted into the International Cricket Council's Hall of Fame in 2011

articles.title: Shane Warne portrait added to Greats of the Game collection at Bradman museum
articles.description: Shane Warne was set to sit for this portrait, the last in a collection of 20 depicting the world's greatest cricketers, until his sudden death in Thailand changed the plans of artist Dave Thomas.
articles.content:
A portrait of Shane Warne completed after his death has been unveiled as the final painting in a collection of artworks depicting the most influential cricketers of all time.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
